translation.en: He came back again last night and tore me like paper.
translation.zh:
他昨晚又来造访
把我当洋娃娃一样耍着

translation.en: He opened me like a flower of pain...
...and it felt good.
He sank into me and set me on fire...
translation.zh: 他深入我体内，让我燃烧...

translation.en: ...like he always does.
Made me burn from the inside out.
How did you know it was the devil?
translation.zh: 你怎么知道是恶魔干的？

translation.en: I know what you're thinking.
I know you think I'm talking about my stepfather...
translation.zh: 你认为我说的是我继父...

translation.en: ...because you don't believe in the devil.
Okay, let's talk about your stepfather.
translation.zh: 好，那我们谈谈你继父吧

translation.en: You know about my stepfather. You know I cut his throat.
translation.zh:
你知道我继父的事
你知道我给了他喉咙一刀

translation.en: I cut his Adam's apple in half...
translation.zh: 我一刀对半切开他的喉结...

translation.en: ...like a piece of fruit on a summer day...
...so he wouldn't say a word.
translation.zh: 那样他就没法再命令我

translation.en: I sat next to him and watched him die...
...slowly.
It was the only way to help him stop.
translation.zh: 那是唯一遏止他的办法

translation.en: Stop what?
Stop fucking me!
You're not listening.
I am listening, Chloe.
You're not listening with your heart. Just your brain.
translation.zh: 你没用心听，就只会用脑袋分析

translation.en: Your brain is the problem.
You have no idea how it feels not to be trusted.
translation.zh: 你根本不明白不被信赖的感觉

translation.en: You've got to trust me too, Chloe.
You can't trust someone who thinks you're crazy.
translation.zh: 你不能相信把你当成疯子的人

translation.en: Okay. I think that's enough for today.
translation.zh: 好吧，我想今天这样就够了

translation.en: But I do think we made some really good headway...
translation.zh: 我觉得我们有不少进步...

translation.en: ...found out some new things--
Do you know what it is to burn from the inside?
translation.zh: 你知道体内炽热燃烧的感觉吗？

translation.en: -Do you know? Because you are dead! -Let her go, Chloe.
translation.zh:
-你不知道，因为你麻木不仁！
-放开她，萝伊

translation.en: I am. I'm not touching her! I'm not touching her! Let me go!
translation.zh: 我没碰她！我没碰她！放开我！

translation.en: Let me go! Let me go.
Thank you.
You're driving me crazy! Stop!
-Stop it! -Let go!
Stop it!
I can walk by myself!
Stand up!
Look at that.
"I'm a doctor."
"Open this door." Hey, you are dead!
translation.zh: 〝打开这间〞你这个麻木不仁的！

translation.en: Get in.
She's nuts.
Hey.
Sorry.
I need to cross-reference some files with you on Monday. How's your morning?
translation.zh:
我周一要跟你比对几个档案
你早上有空吗？

translation.en: -Check with Anna. She'll fit you in. -Thanks. Sorry.
translation.zh:
-问安娜，她会帮你排
-谢了，抱歉

translation.en: I'm not discharging her, period.
If you want to pursue this, sir, have a judge order her transfer.
translation.zh:
你若想继续追这件案子
找个法官下令移监吧

translation.en: Until then she's mine.
translation.zh: 在那之前她还是我的人

translation.en: Thank you.
Lawyers.
Hey, come on in.
What's up?
Chloe. She's embellishing her rape story again.
translation.zh: 萝伊又开始夸大强暴的故事了

translation.en: She says that the devil is visiting her in her cell.
translation.zh: 她说恶魔到她牢房里找她

translation.en: -Okay. -It's the third time in three months.
translation.zh:
-好吧
-三个月内这是第三次了

translation.en: It has something to do with her stepfather, possibly remorse...
translation.zh:
我想这跟她继父有关
也许是因为懊悔...

translation.en: ...but instead of assessing the memory and accepting it...
translation.zh: 但她没有重新反省记忆...

translation.en: ...she just falls into these satanic meanderings.
translation.zh: 却坠入这种恶魔的邪说

translation.en: Time. Give it time.
I've given it time. Time and Elavil. And Mellaril and Haldol.
translation.zh:
我有，我给了时间和抗抑郁药
还有抗幻觉剂和神经纾缓剂

translation.en: Maybe they're just...
...too medicated.
I know we all create our realities to some extent. Yes, true.
translation.zh:
人多少都会创造出自己的现实
对，没错

translation.en: But what she creates is so far from any objective reality....
translation.zh: 但她创造的跟客观现实差太多了...

translation.en: Chloe's mind only runs on one track.
translation.zh: 萝伊的心里有自己的宇宙

translation.en: Well, right now, my mind is running on empty.
translation.zh: 现在，我的心却空空如也

translation.en: Come here.
You have a brilliant mind.
You'll figure it out.
Throw it on the mirror.
This is what she sees now.
-A distorted image of herself. -Who are you in all this?
translation.zh:
-她自己扭曲的影像
-你的角色是什么？

translation.en: -I'm the mirror. -You are the mirror.
If I'm the mirror and she's the image...
translation.zh: 如果我是镜子，她是影像...

translation.en: ...then who are you?
I can see both of you...
translation.zh: 我可以同时看到你们俩个...

translation.en: ...so I'm God.
Or just an overworked hospital bureaucrat.
translation.zh: 或者只是个工作过度的医院主管

translation.en: "God" is good.
Always remember, the ability to repress...
translation.zh: 永远要记得压抑的能力...

translation.en: ...is actually a vital survival tool. Without it...
translation.zh: 其实是很重要的生存工具，没有了它...

translation.en: ...Chloe might not have survived.
Sorry, am I interrupting the happy couple?
translation.zh: 我打扰到你们夫妻亲热了？

translation.en: Dr. Graham. We were just discussing repression as a survival mechanism.
translation.zh:
格兰医生
我们正在讨论压抑是生存的机制

translation.en: Oh, yeah, I had a date last week.
translation.zh:
我上周勉强撑过一个约会
也正想忘了它

translation.en: I barely survived it. I'm trying to forget it.
translation.zh:
我上周勉强撑过一个约会
也正想忘了它 我相信你的情色冒险一定很精彩...

translation.en: I'm sure your amorous adventures are fascinating, doctor...
translation.zh: 我相信你的情色冒险一定很精彩...

translation.en: ...but sadly, I'm on my way out.
translation.zh: 但很遗憾的，我正要离开

translation.en: -Well, don't let me-- I'll just-- -No, no, no, I'm leaving.
I'm gonna run out to Willow Creek. Meet the new contractor.
translation.zh: 我要去柳溪庄园一下，去见新的承包商

translation.en: I'll be here. See you at dinner.
Keep an eye on my wife for me, Pete. I know you will. Here.
translation.zh: 留意我老婆，我知道你会的，来

translation.en: -No, thanks. -No, let me circumcise it for you.
translation.zh:
-不，谢了
-我帮你把包皮割了吧

translation.en: Smoke it tonight while it's fresh.
-Good night, boss. -Good night, kids.
Why don't we share one of those golden-crust, cheese-filled specials.
translation.zh:
我们叫个什锦芝心比萨来吃吧
料多奶酪多

translation.en: -It sounds like a great offer... -Here's the file.
-...but I got work to do. -I'm buying.
-It's cold when it gets here. -We could warm it up.
translation.zh:
-送到这里都凉了
-我们可以再热过

translation.en: -I hate pizza. -Who doesn't like pizza?
Come on, you gotta eat.
Not with you.
Come on, we're supposed to celebrate. I just got circumcised....
translation.zh:
拜托，我们该庆祝一下
我刚刚割包皮了呢？

translation.en: -Who's inside? -We have Shelley for observation.
-Why? What happened? -She had another attack.
-What'd you do, up her meds? -Yeah, 25 milligrams.
That's extreme. That dose is way too high.
I want a copy of that on my desk by Monday, okay?
translation.zh: 报告周一早上给我一份，好吗？

translation.en: -Okay. -Thank you.
Damn generator.
Not again.
Irene, is that you?
This electric system's gonna give us trouble.
translation.zh: 这电力系统会搞死我们

translation.en: Fourth time this week. I'm going for my swim.
translation.zh: 是啊，一周四次，我去游泳了

translation.en: Well, I'm gonna do my job, as long as these damn lights stay on.
translation.zh: 只要灯亮着我就得尽责值班

translation.en: -Good night, Joe. -Hey, how many laps, doc?
Fifty-five, but who's counting?
Oh, you've outdone yourself. Hey, safe drive home.
translation.zh: 你越来越厉害了，开车注意安全

translation.en: Thank you. Say hi to your wife for me. Will do.
All that education but you can't remember an umbrella.
translation.zh: 受过那么多教育，却不记得带伞

translation.en: -Did you get my note? -I got your note. Your business note.
translation.zh:
-你看到我的字条了？
-有，关于业务的字条

translation.en: Right. So how was your date with...?
translation.zh: 对，你约会的那个对象叫...

translation.en: With what's-her-name? It was like all of my dates. It was brief. It was pointless.
translation.zh:
什么来着？跟我往常的约会
一样短暂，毫无意义可言

translation.en: She didn't respond to my sense of humor, my boyish good looks...
translation.zh:
她不喜欢我的幽默感
和我天真烂漫的样子...

translation.en: ...so I started talking about work.
She said that was not a suitable topic for a first date...
translation.zh: 她说初次约会不适合谈那个...

translation.en: ...and that was it. I mean, it was just drinks, you know.
I mean, we didn't even have dinner.
She's not right. When you know, you know.
translation.zh: 她不适合我，我就是知道

translation.en: I know.
-I'll follow you down the hill. -You don't have to.
-I'm supposed to keep an eye on you. -Since when did you listen to the boss?
translation.zh:
-老板命令我要留意你的
-你什么时候这么听话啦？

translation.en: Severe showers all over northern Connecticut and New Hampshire.
translation.zh: 康州北部和新罕布什尔州大雨倾盆

translation.en: -I know, I see that. --rain in Lennox County....
--flooding throughout Lennox County and closure....
-I can't let you through. Road's closed. -What's going on?
translation.zh:
-你不能过去，道路封闭了
-怎么回事？

translation.en: -I got this. -There's a sinkhole.
Hi, Bob. You picked a hell of a night for a drive.
There's a sinkhole up here, you can't get through. Sorry.
-What should I do? -Go a quarter of a mile, take a left--
translation.zh:
-我该怎么办？
-往那边开，４百米后左转...

translation.en: You know that bridge that Doug and I fish at?
translation.zh: 知道我跟道格常去钓鱼的桥吧？

translation.en: -Yeah, the little white one? -That's the one.
-Yeah. -You can go across there.
-Okay, thanks. -Hey, tell Doug to give me a call.
translation.zh:
-好吧，谢谢
-叫道格打个电话给我

translation.en: Will do.
-Doug, you're home? -Yeah, where are you?
I got detoured, so I'll be home in a few minutes, okay? How was Willow Creek?
translation.zh:
我改走别的路，很快就到家
柳溪庄园怎样？

translation.en: This rain is slowing the work down. It's a big mess.
-Are you okay? -Yeah.
Doug.
Doug!
Are you okay?
Are you okay?
Hey!
Oh, my God. Okay. Okay. Okay.
I'm a doctor. I'm gonna take you to the hospital. I'm a doctor, honey.
translation.zh:
我是医生，我带你上医院
我是医生

translation.en: I'm gonna help you, okay? You're gonna be okay.
translation.zh: 我会帮你，你不会有事的

translation.en: I'm gonna help you, okay?
Help me!
Somebody!
Dr. Graham!
You better tell me why I'm in here, Irene.
She got up wild.
-Bring your ass back in here. -Give me 40 milligrams of Ativan.
translation.zh:
-你给我回来
-给我４０毫克的镇静剂

translation.en: -Get your hands off me. -Stay in the cell.
translation.zh:
-把你的手拿开
-待在观察室里

translation.en: -Keep her off. -Restrain her.
Keep her off of me. Get off of me. Do you hear me? Get off of me.
translation.zh:
放开我，放开我，听见吗？
放开我

translation.en: Hold on. Calm--
What are you doing? What are you doing to me?
Thank you, nurse.
-Are you okay? -Yeah, she calmed down.
translation.zh:
-你没事吧？
-是啊，她安静一点了

translation.en: This is so sad.
Miranda, this is very awkward.
translation.zh: 米兰达，这真的很令人为难

translation.en: I suppose that technically I shouldn't even be treating you...
translation.zh: 技术上来说我不该负责治疗你...

translation.en: ...but I managed to get the court to grant us a waiver... ...until you're transferred.
translation.zh:
但我设法让法院给我们特别许可
直到你移监为止

translation.en: Anything we discuss is in strict confidence...
...and won't go anywhere but this room.
translation.zh: 一切都是机密，不会外泄

translation.en: How long have I been in here?
Three days.
Why? Why?
You were admitted to our neurosurgical unit... ...you were seizing violently.
translation.zh:
神经外科送你进来的
你极端狂暴

translation.en: We did scans and they revealed left-sided weakness, numbness...
...severe frontal-lobe deficits.
You received Haloperidol, Ativan injections.
translation.zh: 你被注射神经纾缓剂，镇静剂

translation.en: When you came out of it, we tested. You were negative for PCP.
translation.zh:
你平静下来后我们做了检测
你的检测值是负值

translation.en: You were put in restraints for a day and a half... ...so you wouldn't injure yourself.
translation.zh:
你被送来这里一天半
这是为了避免你自残

translation.en: And then you basically went into a state of catatonia.
translation.zh: 你得了紧张性精神分裂症

translation.en: This is the first time I've seen you lucid.
translation.zh: 这是我第一次看你镇定下来

translation.en: I wanna talk to my husband.
Where is he? Where is he?
You know, you're the most logical person I know, bar none.
translation.zh: 你是我认识最理性的人了

translation.en: You rely only on the facts.
So why am I telling you this?
You're establishing my personality.
You think I'm a rational person. You don't think I'm impulsive or emotional.
translation.zh:
你认为我是理性的人
你不认为我会冲动或感情用事

translation.en: And following this pattern of analysis, we are about to discuss...
translation.zh:
照这个分析模式
我们接下来要谈的是...

translation.en: ...a traumatic event which has rendered... ...this psychological profile useless.
translation.zh: 让这个心理特质崩解的冲击事件

translation.en: -You think I'm in denial. -Don't analyze yourself...
translation.zh:
-你认为我在否定现实
-别分析自己...

translation.en: ...just focus on remembering.
Miranda...
...what's the last thing you remember?
I remember Chloe.
I was having my Friday night session with Chloe.
translation.zh: 我周五晚上照例帮萝伊做心理咨询

translation.en: How did that go?
She was embellishing her rape story.
translation.zh: 她又夸张描述强暴故事了

translation.en: -I saw Doug. -Dr. Graham.
You were there.
When I went back to my office, I worked on Chloe's file.
translation.zh: 我回到我的办公室，研究萝伊的病历

translation.en: I decided to call it quits, I went down to the pool, had a swim, 55 laps...
translation.zh: 我决定休息，到泳池去，我游了５５趟

translation.en: ...saw Joe, got my keys. Went to my car. You walked me to it.
translation.zh:
我看到老乔，拿了车钥匙
走向我的车，你陪我走过去的

translation.en: -Yes. -But--
-There was a detour. -Oh, hey, tell Doug....
translation.zh:
-我被迫改道行驶
-对了，告诉道格...

translation.en: I had to go over the bridge, so I went over the bridge.
translation.zh: 我必须过桥，所以我就往桥那边开去

translation.en: I wonder what else happened. Try to remember.
translation.zh: 还发生了什么事？想想看

translation.en: I got home.
I saw Doug. He was on the couch.
translation.zh: 我看到道格，他坐在沙发上

translation.en: Try to remember.
There was a girl.
-Yeah, there was a girl. -No, there was no--
Yeah, there was a girl.
-A girl at the bridge. -There was no report--
translation.zh:
-桥头有个女孩
-没有事故报告...

translation.en: -There was some kind of accident. -No.
translation.zh:
-那里出了意外事故，对吧？
-没有

translation.en: -The girl was bloody. On the bridge.... -I want to ask you about Doug.
translation.zh:
-那女孩满身是血，就在桥头...
-我要你谈谈道格

translation.en: What's the last thing you remember?
Why are you asking about Doug? I'm telling you about a girl I saw.
translation.zh: 你干嘛问他？我在说那个女孩

translation.en: Was there any trouble in your marriage?
translation.zh: 你们的婚姻之前是不是有问题？

translation.en: No, there was no trouble in my marriage.
And why are you using the past tense of the word?
translation.zh: 你为何用过去式的语法问我？

translation.en: Miranda...
...you don't remember anything about Doug? Anything at all?
translation.zh: 你不记得道格了？什么都不记得？

translation.en: Don't tell me something's wrong with Doug.
I have to tell you something. Something very difficult.
translation.zh: 我得告诉你一件事，这很难启齿

translation.en: No, no, no....
-Don't tell me something's with Doug. -Miranda...
translation.zh:
-别跟我说道格出事了
-米兰达...

translation.en: ...Doug is dead.
You killed him.
-No! No! No! -Orderly!
I didn't.
-No, I didn't. -Orderly!
I didn't! I didn't do it! No!
No! No! No, don't do it!
-It's okay. -I didn't do it. I didn't do it.
I'm on your side.
I'm on your side.
One little bit more.
Rita. Let go.
It's Dr. Grey.
Look it up. Don't look at me like that.
I'm the official champion again.
Hello, Miranda. Welcome.
You're one of us now.
translation.zh: 你现在成了我们的一份子了

translation.en: You know I don't belong here, Chloe.
If you're here, it must mean that you belong.
translation.zh: 你在这里，就表示你跟我们一样

translation.en: You are not a doctor in here.
And even if you tell the truth...
...no one will listen.
You know why? Because you're crazy.
translation.zh: 知道原因吗？因为你是疯子

translation.en: And the more you try to prove them wrong...
translation.zh: 你越想证明他们是错的...

translation.en: ...the crazier you appear.
You are invisible now.
Can you feel it?
Don't touch me.
Are you scared?
No.
You should be.
I'm dreaming.
I'm dreaming.
Dream logic, primary process, that's what this is.
translation.zh: 梦的逻辑，基本过程，现在就是这样

translation.en: I'm dreaming.
I'm dreaming. I'm dreaming. I'm dreaming.
I'm dreaming. I'm dreaming.
I'm not crazy. I'm dreaming.
Rise and shine, honey. It's a new day.
translation.zh: 起床了，又是崭新的一天

translation.en: I wanna talk to Pete.
You'll see Dr. Graham all in good time... ...but I want you to have some breakfast.
translation.zh:
你总会见到格兰医生的
但我要你先吃些早点

translation.en: -Why are you doing this to me, Irene? -I'm just doing my job.
translation.zh:
-艾琳，你为什么这样对我？
-我只是做我该做的事

translation.en: You don't want me to get Jim to help me, now do you?
translation.zh: 你不想要我让吉姆帮你吧？

translation.en: Good girl. You're doing good.
Come on, sweetheart, now it's time for a shower.
Come on, honey, time to wash away your sins.
translation.zh: 去吧，该洗净你一身的罪恶了

translation.en: You're a nut.
Yeah, it's you. You.
Get away. Get away.
What's your problem?
What's your problem?
I looked away for a second. It's unacceptable.
translation.zh: 我眼光才移开一下，真糟糕

translation.en: It's not your fault.
Patients always find a way to hurt themselves, if that's what they want.
translation.zh:
病人总会找办法伤害自己
他们就是这样

translation.en: I never pegged her for a cutter, that's all.
translation.zh: 我没看到她挟带刀片，真的

translation.en: Neither did I.
Shelley says Chloe's been threatening Miranda...
translation.zh: 雪莉说萝伊威胁米兰达...

translation.en: ...so I put her in isolation for the day.
translation.zh: 所以我把她关进隔离室了

translation.en: How is she?
She's a mess.
I can't believe she's lost it so quickly. I've never seen that before.
translation.zh:
真不敢相信她这么快就失控了
我没看过这种情况

translation.en: She cut herself 35 times, a lot of blood, but it's superficial.
translation.zh: 她自残３５刀，但只是皮肉伤

translation.en: -What was the implement? -Probably a scalpel...
...though how anybody got it in there, I have no idea.
translation.zh: 但我不知道谁能带这玩意进来

translation.en: Hey, Tony. We're fine.
Come on.
You think I did this to myself, don't you?
Did you?
No.
Well, I don't know.
Who would it be, then? Would it be...
...Chloe, or...?
I don't know.
By your own admission you have difficulty...
...distinguishing what's reality from fantasy, so is it possible?
translation.zh: 分辨事实与幻觉，所以这可能吗？

translation.en: Yeah, as a doctor, I understand why you think that.
translation.zh:
是啊，身为医生
我明白你为何会这么想

translation.en: But something is really happening to me.
translation.zh: 但我身上真的发生了怪事

translation.en: What about this moment, right now?
What about it?
Is this a hallucination?
Is it?
I suggest that we simply increase the medication...
...until things make sense.
translation.zh: 直到一切恢复正常为止

translation.en: Or maybe until I can get myself a new doctor.
translation.zh: 或者我可以换个新医生

translation.en: Pardon?
Since I'm hallucinating and I can't seem to remember things...
translation.zh: 既然我有幻觉，也记不得事情...

translation.en: ...you can help me with something.
translation.zh: 也许你能帮我回忆一些

translation.en: Yeah. Inhale.
Did we have an affair?
translation.zh: 我们之间有暧昧关系吗？

translation.en: No.
Did you want to?
Yes.
Did you think I wanted to?
Yes.
Then why didn't we?
Because you were married to the boss.
But I'm not now.
I'm here-- I'm....
I'm trying to help you.
Why don't you trust me?
Because you can't trust somebody when they think you're crazy.
translation.zh: 不能相信把你当成疯子的人

translation.en: Phil.
Hello, Miranda.
I need to talk to you for a minute.
This is about Pete.
What about him, Miranda?
I don't think he's the best doctor to be treating me.
translation.zh: 我不认为他最有资格医治我

translation.en: Is your complaint about him on a personal level?
Pete's the best doctor I have on my staff now.
translation.zh: 现在彼得是我手中最好的医生

translation.en: And he has my full support.
Now, if you'll excuse me, Miranda.
-Miranda. -Hi, Teddy.
-How are they treating you? -Like I'm crazy, Teddy.
-They think I did it, but I didn't do it. -All right. Thank you.
translation.zh:
-他们认为我是凶手，但我不是
-谢谢

translation.en: -I didn't do it, Teddy. -Have a seat.
Let's not....
Let's not talk about what you did or didn't do, all right?
translation.zh: 我们别谈你到底有没有做，好吗？

translation.en: What's important is what I can do for you now.
translation.zh: 重要的是，我能为你做些什么

translation.en: Now, the DA is pushing for a hearing as early as next week.
translation.zh: 检察官要求下周开庭审判

translation.en: Next week? We haven't even had time to investigate.
translation.zh: 下周？我们连调查的时间都没有

translation.en: We can't have a hearing next week.
As your attorney, I gotta tell you the evidence is overwhelming.
translation.zh:
我知道，身为你的律师...
我得告诉你，你的罪证如山

translation.en: You've been placed at the scene. The sheriff saw you driving home.
translation.zh:
你到过案发现场
警长亲眼看到你开车回家

translation.en: The neighbors heard the screams.
They've got the murder weapon with your prints on it.
translation.zh: 杀人凶器上都是你的指纹

translation.en: Your prints are on the floor, walls, everything.
translation.zh: 现场到处都有你的指纹

translation.en: Yeah, but what's my motive? I don't have a motive, Teddy.
translation.zh: 动机何在？我没有动机啊

translation.en: Why would I do that? Maybe one of his ex-patients came.
translation.zh:
我为什么要杀人？
也许他以前的病人找上门

translation.en: Has anybody checked the files? Has anybody escaped?
translation.zh: 你查过吗？也许有人逃出去了？

translation.en: That person would have a motive. I was there, and I would scream.
translation.zh:
那个人才会有杀人动机
对，我可能在场惊吓的大叫

translation.en: -Maybe I went into shock. -Miranda.
The only shot we have is to plead temporary insanity.
translation.zh: 辩称丧失心智是我们唯一的机会

translation.en: I don't even know if that's gonna work. You're a brilliant psychiatrist.
translation.zh:
我甚至不知道这招有没有用
你是优秀心理医师

translation.en: That will make jurors think "If she wanted to kill somebody...
translation.zh: 陪审团会想，〝她如果想杀人...

translation.en: ...she could probably fake insanity and get away with it."
translation.zh: 就可能装疯卖傻，逍遥法外〞

translation.en: I'm not crazy.
-That's the point. -No, the point is...
...I'm the only one around here that believes I didn't kill my husband!
translation.zh: 我是唯一相信我没杀我丈夫的人！

translation.en: Do you think I'm crazy?
That's all right. Forget it.
Forget it.
Sheriff Ryan is here.
He'd like to talk to you.
You know he was Doug's best friend, so I'd advise against it.
translation.zh:
你知道他是道格的好友
我建议你拒绝他

translation.en: It's fine, Teddy. I don't have anything to hide.
translation.zh: 没关系，我没什么好隐瞒的

translation.en: Five minutes.
Hi, Bob.
Miranda.
I just have a few questions that we need to clear up.
When you first came in and he was sitting on the couch...
translation.zh: 你刚回到家时，他正坐在沙发上...

translation.en: ...the way we reconstruct the crime... ...is the first blow came from in front of him.
translation.zh: 我们重现案发现场，第一击来自正前方

translation.en: Which means he must have seen it coming.
translation.zh: 那代表他一定目睹了那一击

translation.en: And what we don't understand is how he....
-Why did you do it? -Sheriff.
How could you kill Doug like that? He loved you.
translation.zh: 你怎么能下这样的毒手？他爱你

translation.en: -That's the question I need answered. -You don't have to answer.
translation.zh:
-这是我唯一想理清的问题
-你不用回答任何问题

translation.en: I don't have any answers to the questions, Bob.
You don't? You better start thinking... ...of some answers, because you're in some trouble.
translation.zh:
无法回答？你最好快想些答案
因为你的麻烦大了

translation.en: -Sheriff, that's enough. That's enough! -No, no, no.
I need her to tell me why she did it.
translation.zh: 我要她看着我的眼睛讲清楚

translation.en: Okay, we're done. Enough!
Let's kill your friend, see how you feel!
translation.zh: 干脆杀了你朋友看你有何反应吧！

translation.en: -You said no shock treatment. -Here's some shock treatment!
translation.zh:
-你说过不会吓她的
-这才算是惊吓吧！

translation.en: Stop it. Why would you take these out? Don't look.
Don't look at them.
I had to pick him up off the floor, Miranda. In pieces!
translation.zh:
我得从地上捡拾他的尸块
一片一片的捡！

translation.en: Miranda, what's that?
It's okay. It's okay, Miranda.
-Why are you doing this to me? -Miranda, let's just go. We're done.
translation.zh:
-你们为何这样对我？
-我们走吧，谈话结束

translation.en: -Why are you doing this to me? -It's okay.
-Why are you doing this to me? -It's okay.
Why are you doing this to me? Why are you doing this to me?!
translation.zh:
你们为何这样对我？
你们为何这样对我？

translation.en: Come in, Miranda.
Please, take a seat.
You wanted to see me.
I was there.
I was there when Doug was killed.
But I wasn't alone.
I wasn't there alone, and that's what "not alone" means.
translation.zh:
我并不孤单
那就是〝不孤单〞所代表的意思

translation.en: -Who was there with you? -I don't know who it was.
translation.zh:
-谁跟你在一起？
-我不知道是谁

translation.en: I don't know. I don't know who it was.
But somebody else was there.
Miranda.
We know you have no family left.
translation.zh: 我们知道你没有别的家人

translation.en: We are your family now.
I know. I know you.... I know.
I want you to know that we're gonna do everything we possibly can...
translation.zh: 我想要你知道我们打算竭尽全力...

translation.en: ...to help you and to make you feel secure.
And to make you feel that you can trust us here.
translation.zh: 也让你觉得能信任我们

translation.en: But there's a hearing scheduled.
translation.zh: 但是开庭时间已经订好了

translation.en: -Miranda. Sit down. -Just-- Come on, sit down.
Miranda.
Who is this girl?
-Put the picture back. -Who is this girl?
That's my daughter, Rachel.
No, this is the girl I saw at the bridge. This is the girl.
translation.zh: 不，这是我在桥头看到的女孩，就是她

translation.en: -No. -How is she? Where is she?
-It's impossible. -This is the girl I've been seeing.
translation.zh:
-不可能的
-这就是我看到的女孩

translation.en: This girl, right here.
She's dead.
Rachel died four years ago.
I'm a rational person.
I believe in science.
I don't believe in the paranormal.
And I don't believe in ghosts.
But if you are the ghost of Rachel Parsons...
translation.zh: 但如果你是芮秋帕森的鬼魂...

translation.en: ...then you would let me out of this cell.
translation.zh: 你就让我离开这个牢房

translation.en: Bob, you leave this?
Shit. Pete's office.
Chloe.
Chloe!
Help me!
Let me go! Let me go!
Check Chloe! Check Chloe! She needs help!
translation.zh:
快看看萝伊！
去看看萝伊！她需要帮忙！

translation.en: -Did you talk to Chloe? -Yes.
-Was she raped? -Was she raped? No.
-Why? -Did you check her?
Did I--? She was checked. Of course she was checked.
-He didn't have time. -He?
-What about her face? She had a cut. -Ran into a wall. She did that to herself.
translation.zh:
-她的脸呢？她被割伤了
-她是撞墙，她自己撞的

translation.en: I saw a tattoo. Did she talk about a tattoo?
translation.zh: 我看到纹身，她有说纹身的事吗？

translation.en: -Why don't you sit down. A tattoo? -Yeah, a tattoo.
A woman in flames, hands up like this:
translation.zh:
一个全身是火的女人
她手向上伸，就像这样：

translation.en: Like a Biblical image.
The Anima Sola?
-The Anima Sola. That's what I saw. -It's a common archetypal image.
translation.zh:
-对，我就是看到那个
-那是常见的经典图像

translation.en: I mean, it's the woman in chains, awaiting her fate.
translation.zh: 被炼住的女人，等待命运处置

translation.en: I'm talking about something I saw on the chest of a man.
translation.zh: 我是说我看到这男人胸前的纹身

translation.en: -That's what I saw. -You're in crisis.
translation.zh:
-我就是看到那个图
-你面临危机

translation.en: This image is tailor-made for your state of mind.
translation.zh: 这影像正符合你的心境

translation.en: A woman in purgatory.
I need you to explain this to me, though.
-Rachel did not commit suicide. -She jumped off a bridge.
translation.zh:
-芮秋帕森并没有自杀
-她从桥上跳下

translation.en: -When I saw her-- -She was washed downstream 5 miles.
translation.zh:
-当我看到她时...
-被溪水冲到下游

translation.en: -She was cut up. -You saw her?
-I saw her. Someone did that to her! -Police, newspapers, coroner wrong?
translation.zh:
-是，有人蓄意对她下毒手！
-大家都搞错了？

translation.en: -Let's reopen the case. -Maybe they should!
translation.zh:
-重新调查好了
-也许该重新调查！

translation.en: -I saw her. And she's connected to me. -Delusions, hallucinations...
translation.zh:
-我看见她，她和我交流过
-错觉、幻想...

translation.en: -How, I don't know. -...disorganized speech, incoherence--
Don't rattle off your psychiatric shit! I know it like the back of my hand!
translation.zh:
别跟我讲那些病症！
我很清楚那些病症！

translation.en: Good.
Saves me the trouble.
Glass cells are having electrical problems.
translation.zh: 观察室的电力系统有问题

translation.en: I'm gonna transfer you to a Psych Ward cell.
One strike, you're going to solitary.
Don't screw up.
Rachel Parsons was there.
Dead or alive, I don't know.
That girl came to me.
She came to me.
Hi, Chloe.
I'm sorry.
I'm sorry.
I'm sorry I didn't believe you.
I need you to tell me who did this to you.
translation.zh: 我要你告诉我是谁攻击你

translation.en: Tell me his name, Chloe.
Chloe, tell me. Tell me anything. Tell me.
I'll tell you one thing:
He can have my body...
...but he will never have my soul.
translation.zh: 却永远不能占有我的灵魂

translation.en: Never.
The devil.
It's okay.
It's okay.
He said you're next.
-Try to stay awake. -Yes, ma'am.
If you need me, I'll be in the coffee room.
translation.zh: 需要我的话，我在茶水间

translation.en: Lights out.
Leave me alone!
-Doesn't even look like a real ant. -It's got disco balls for eyes.
translation.zh:
-看起来根本不像蚂蚁
-它的眼睛是舞池的镜球

translation.en: -'50s B movies, man. -Giant bug movies are great.
translation.zh:
-５０年代的二流电影嘛
-有大昆虫的电影很棒

translation.en: Hey, what is that?
It's Dr. Grey. She's trying to kill herself.
Level C, we've got suicidal behavior in cell 33. Sending backup.
translation.zh: Ｃ区３３号房有人自杀，请派人支援

translation.en: Open it!
Dr. Grey's in trouble!
Number 33, open it now!
Oh, damn. Damn, what a mess.
-Hold her, I'll medicate her. -What the hell for? She's already out.
translation.zh:
-捉好她，我帮她注射
-干嘛？她已经昏了

translation.en: Don't argue with me.
Jesus! Easy, easy. No, don't hurt me.
Stop her! She's got my keys, stop her!
translation.zh: 拦住她！她拿了我的钥匙

translation.en: Shit!
Hey! Hey!
Wait! Hey!
We got a runner! Inmate escaping! Block Three!
-Stay with me. -All right.
She's gone this way. Let's go!
Clear!
Split up! Keep moving!
She's going up the North Tower!
Shit!
Shit!
Hey! It's already open!
She's on the upper level!
Hold it right there!
Dr. Grey! We're on Three, she's heading for One!
translation.zh:
-葛雷医生！
-我们在三楼，她往一楼跑！

translation.en: Go! Go!
Go the other way!
Circle back.
Come on, Hank.
Don't think she made it to this building anyway.
Yeah, but even so, there's no way she can get out.
translation.zh: 就算如此，她还是不可能逃掉的

translation.en: Hide-and-seek. The longer it lasts, the more overtime we make.
translation.zh:
我们得玩玩捉迷藏的游戏了
找得越久就加班越久

translation.en: -You should be a professor. -Professors nail the pretty students.
translation.zh:
-你应该是个教授
-教授总会搞漂亮的学生

translation.en: Let's go. I don't think she's in here.
I got it.
Is it clear there?
We checked corridors Four and Five.
translation.zh: 我们查过第４和第５走廊了

translation.en: -We're headed to Six and Seven. -Yeah. It's Joe, up at the desk.
translation.zh:
-好，我们往第６和第７走廊
-门口是老乔当班

translation.en: -What's going on down there? -Looks dark down there.
translation.zh:
-这里怎么回事？
-这里一片漆黑

translation.en: What do you mean, what do I mean?
translation.zh: 你说什么？我是什么意思？

translation.en: Look, this is the fourth time this month... ...this has happened. Never mind.
translation.zh: 这是这个月第四次了，算了

translation.en: -Ye-- Thank you. -Finally.
-Took long enough. -Shit.
Hey, Joe.
You see something?
Yeah, just now when the monitors came on.
translation.zh: 对，刚刚监视器回复的时候

translation.en: Corridor Six, something flashed in front of the camera.
Frank, East Wing. Don, take the West. I'll take the stairs.
translation.zh:
法兰，去搜东侧
小唐搜西侧，我搜楼梯

translation.en: Here, take my car.
Go. Go.
Go on.
What do you want from me?!
Okay. Now what?
Miranda, no!
Doug?
No. No, Miranda, no.
Miranda, don't! No, don't, please!
Please! No! Miranda, no! No, please!
Please! Don't do this to me! No!
Don't! No! Miranda, no, wait!
Don't do this to me, please, Miranda!
Miranda, no! Don't! No!
Don't do this to me, Miranda! Miranda, please!
I love you.
What did I do?
Why?
Why?
Why me?
Why? Why?
Willow Creek.
How was Willow Creek?
This rain is slowing the work down. It's a big damn mess.
I'll see you in a couple of days.
It's good to be God.
I love you.
-Drop the knife! -Drop the gun!
Put it on the ground now!
-Drop the gun! -Drop the knife!
-You drop it! -Holy Christ.
What?
Help me, please!
Help!
Carter, get down here now!
Help me, please!
Please!
All I can tell you is that the girl has been identified as Tracy Seavers.
translation.zh: 这名女性经查明是特蕾西薛佛

translation.en: She was reported missing two weeks ago.
translation.zh: 两周前她父母报警说她失踪

translation.en: She was found this morning by two patrolmen in Willow Creek...
translation.zh: 今早警方在柳溪庄园找到她...

translation.en: ...at a farm belonging to Dr. Douglas Grey. She is now hospitalized.
translation.zh:
该庄园原属于道格葛雷医生
她目前正在就医

translation.en: Can she speak? Has she told you anything?
translation.zh: 她能说话吗？她说了什么？

translation.en: -We can't comment on that. -Are there others?
translation.zh:
-我们无法评论她的健康状况
-是否还有其他受害者？

translation.en: We can't confirm that. Excuse me.
translation.zh: 我们无法确认此事，抱歉

translation.en: Sheriff, is the FBI taking over this investigation?
translation.zh: 联邦调查局是否会接手调查？

translation.en: Why don't you ask the goddamn FBI?
We need her at the hospital for medication.
translation.zh: 我们要送她回医院治疗

translation.en: Consider house arrest pending trial, given the circumstances.
translation.zh: 算是等待审判前的监禁行动

translation.en: Last night, your client dropped a guard...
translation.zh: 昨晚你的委托人撂倒一个警卫...

translation.en: ...assaulted a nurse, escaped from an institution, stole a car--
translation.zh:
攻击一位护士
从精神病感化所逃出，偷了车...

translation.en: And saved a girl's life.
-How did she know she was there? -I don't know.
translation.zh:
-她怎么知道那女孩在那？
-我不知道

translation.en: -But the point is-- -The woman is still a murder suspect!
translation.zh:
-重点是...
-重点是那女人仍旧是杀人疑犯！

translation.en: Come here.
The FBI says there could be more victims.
translation.zh: 联邦调查局说可能还有更多被害人

translation.en: There were needles down there, a video camera.
translation.zh: 那里到处是针筒，还有摄影机

translation.en: Once the press gets ahold of it, it'll get big and ugly.
translation.zh: 一旦媒体得到消息就闹大了

translation.en: Now, I need some answers, and I'm running out of time.
So your client isn't going anywhere until my team....
I need to talk to her.
It's hard to believe Doug did something like this.
translation.zh: 很难相信道格会做这种事

translation.en: We worked together a long time. I thought I knew him pretty well.
translation.zh: 我们共事很久了，我以为我很了解他

translation.en: How could I be so blind?
Well, you weren't the only one, Phil.
translation.zh: 你不是唯一的一个，菲尔

translation.en: Do you think my daughter could also have been a victim of Doug's?
translation.zh: 你想我女儿也遭到道格的毒手？

translation.en: Yes.
That's what "not alone" means.
Rachel was trying to tell me that she was not Doug's only victim.
translation.zh:
芮秋想告诉我
她不是道格唯一的受害人

translation.en: And all this time...
...we thought our baby had committed suicide.
translation.zh: 我们一直以为我们的宝贝是自杀

translation.en: You see...
...even after she was gone....
Well....
What?
I had this recurring dream about her.
Eventually I took medication to block it out.
translation.zh: 最后我用药物来遏止这个梦

translation.en: What kind of dream?
She was burning in flames, in terrible pain.
translation.zh: 她全身着火，样子痛苦莫名

translation.en: I couldn't save her.
I saw her exactly the same way, burning in flames.
translation.zh: 我也看到同样的画面，她全身着火

translation.en: What does that mean?
Miranda, I-- I....
I wouldn't look for a real-world explanation.
translation.zh: 我不会寻找真实世界的解答

translation.en: It's a dream, a delusion.
A delusion that we both seem to share.
translation.zh: 一个我们两个都有的幻想

translation.en: -Yeah. -Pete.
I was just talking to Parsons.
I've been wrong about everything until now.
It's finally clear to me. The image is finally clear.
The man raping women in prison is connected to the murders.
translation.zh: 在牢里强奸女犯的人跟凶手有关

translation.en: It goes back to the Anima Sola tattoo.
translation.zh: 一切都跟炼狱纹身有关

translation.en: Miranda, you have to stop doing this. Do you understand me?
translation.zh: 米兰达，你得停止这一切，你知道吗？

translation.en: Every time people start taking you seriously, you talk about delusions.
translation.zh:
每次大家开始认真对待你
你就开始说这些幻觉

translation.en: I'm not deluded, Pete, I'm possessed.
translation.zh: 我不是幻想，我是被附身

translation.en: I don't believe in ghosts.
Neither do I, but they believe in me.
translation.zh: 我也不信，但它们相信我

translation.en: Great, just great.
Let's go. Come on.
I need to talk to Sheriff Ryan.
He's working with the FBI team. He won't be back tonight.
translation.zh: 他跟联邦调查局去查案，不会过来

translation.en: It's really important.
I'll leave him a message.
Thank you.
Screw it.
I got a message you wanted to talk to me?
Yeah, Bob.
I wanna talk to you. Maybe this time you can actually hear me.
translation.zh:
我要跟你谈谈
也许这回你可以认真听我说

translation.en: The last time, all you wanted to do was scream and yell and accuse me--
translation.zh: 上回你只顾着大叫大骂，还指控我...

translation.en: -Is this what you wanna talk about? -No. I wanna talk about the facts.
translation.zh:
-你就是想谈这些？
-不，我想跟你谈事实

translation.en: They're a little different now, right?
translation.zh: 现在情况有点不同了，对吧？

translation.en: Do you know what happens to a small-town sheriff... ...when the FBI takes over?
translation.zh:
你知道一个小镇的警长
被联邦调查局夺走调查权的感觉吗？

translation.en: -If you know anything, anything-- -Not alone.
What?
Not alone.
I know what it means.
There are two killers.
Parsons and I both saw a girl burning in flames.
translation.zh: 我跟帕森都看到全身着火的女孩

translation.en: Then I saw Chloe being raped by a man with an Anima Sola tattoo on his body.
translation.zh:
还有，我看到萝伊被一个人强奸
他身上有炼狱图的纹身

translation.en: A woman burning in flames. Get it?
translation.zh: 一个全身是火的女人，懂吗？

translation.en: Okay, it's crazy. I know it sounds crazy. Pete has told me it's crazy.
translation.zh:
好吧，这很疯狂，我知道
彼得跟我说这太疯狂了

translation.en: -You told Pete? When? -Yes.
Yes.
This afternoon. Why?
I don't think you're crazy at all. I don't know why he would dismiss it.
translation.zh:
我不认为你疯了
我不知道彼得为何会不理你

translation.en: -You actually saw this tattoo? -Yes, I saw it. On a man.
translation.zh:
-你真的看到纹身？
-对，在那男人身上

translation.en: I've heard of serial killers who hunt together.
translation.zh: 我听说过连环杀手会结伙犯案

translation.en: Classic mentor and disciple syndrome.
translation.zh: 典型的宗师和信徒症结

translation.en: So we're looking for the disciple? Who could it be?
translation.zh:
我们是在找信徒吗？
他会是谁呢？

translation.en: -I don't know. -You're a psychiatrist.
What kind of guy would this have to be?
Okay.
He would have to be someone who grew up in a household...
translation.zh: 他是成长于一个单亲家庭...

translation.en: ...that had an absent father.
He developed...
...an obsessive, over-dependent relationship with his mother...
...which then turned into some inappropriate sexual attraction.
translation.zh: 这在后来转变成性倒错

translation.en: He probably even got off torturing little animals as a kid.
translation.zh: 他小时候可能还喜欢虐待动物

translation.en: And as a man he is totally confused about his sexuality.
translation.zh:
身为一个男人
他对自己的性别感到困惑

translation.en: That's who he is.
Man, that's screwed up.
But a guy like that could seem smart and normal, right?
translation.zh: 但这种人可能既聪明又正常吧？

translation.en: Yeah, they usually do. Yeah.
Look, Miranda, I don't wanna scare you...
...but if there is a second killer out there... ...he is frantically trying to cover his trail.
translation.zh:
不过要是还有第二个凶手
他一定疯狂的想掩饰罪行

translation.en: You're a big threat to this guy. Who knows how much more you know?
translation.zh:
你对这个人是很大的威胁
谁知道你知道多少？

translation.en: I don't know anything else.
You saw the tattoo, found the girl at the barn.
translation.zh: 你看到纹身，在谷仓找到女孩

translation.en: Yeah, but I found all that by instinct.
This guy is facing the electric chair.
translation.zh: 这家伙面对的可是死刑

translation.en: He doesn't have the luxury of believing in instinct or ghosts.
translation.zh: 他才不会相信直觉或鬼魂

translation.en: He's gotta believe that Doug confessed to you what he was doing.
translation.zh:
他一定会认为
是道格把一切都跟你说了

translation.en: But he didn't confess.
Maybe he didn't spill it out loud, but....
translation.zh: 也许他没直接说出来，但是...

translation.en: Well, you know, you're a psychiatrist.
There's a lot of ways to confess.
translation.zh: 透露事情的方法有很多种

translation.en: I'm just trying to put myself in this guy's place.
translation.zh: 我只是从这家伙的角度来想

translation.en: Then why didn't he go back to Willow Creek?
translation.zh: 那他为什么不回去柳溪庄园？

translation.en: -Take care of the girl, clean up? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-解决那个女孩，销毁证据？
-是啊

translation.en: Well, that's how you get caught. You panic.
translation.zh: 这样才会被逮到，惊惶失措

translation.en: Better to let the dust settle.
But about you...
-...he's desperate. -Yeah?
Desperate enough to...
...talk to me?
Well, you're right.
I do fit the profile.
Long-time friend of Doug's, access to the prison.
translation.zh: 道格的老朋友，能进出监狱

translation.en: I never did get a kick out of torturing animals, though.
translation.zh: 不过我从来没喜欢过虐待动物

translation.en: Stop it!
-No! -Yes!
-You can't kill me! -I'm not gonna kill you.
After this kicks in... I'm gonna have a lot more fun with you than Doug ever did.
translation.zh:
等你注了这管
我会让你尝尝道格没给过的欢愉

translation.en: Help!
Miranda!
Damn it!
Help me! Help!
Help me!
Okay.
You tried to escape, Miranda.
That means I can do whatever I want to you.
translation.zh: 我就可以对你采取任何行动

translation.en: Rachel wasn't the first, you know.
Doug killed a girl when he was 15 years old!
translation.zh: 道格１５岁时就杀了一个女孩

translation.en: I helped him bury the body.
What are best friends for?
We got older. But I gotta tell you...
...you never lose your taste for the young girls.
translation.zh: 但对年轻美眉还是情有独钟

translation.en: Then we stopped for a long time.
translation.zh: 之后我们停了很长一段时间

translation.en: But then Dougie saw sweet Rachel and....
translation.zh: 但后来道格看到甜美的芮秋...

translation.en: That was an itch way too deep not to scratch.
And then we had the time of our lives out at Willow Creek.
translation.zh: 后来庄园成了我们的极乐天堂

translation.en: Everything was perfect.
Those girls would do anything.
translation.zh: 那些女孩什么都愿意做

translation.en: We were their god.
Until you--
Miranda!
You and I both know you're not getting out of here.
translation.zh: 你我都知道你出不去的

translation.en: So let's be logical...
...and end this thing.
Thank you, Miranda.
Rachel?
This isn't logical.
You're already dead!
Logic is overrated.
I'm sorry, Miranda.
So it's been almost a year and I still have bad dreams.
translation.zh: 已经快一年了，我还是会做恶梦

translation.en: Sometimes I wake up screaming.
That's normal.
No, not these dreams.
Everyone thought you and I were crazy...
translation.zh: 大家都以为你我都疯了...

translation.en: ...but we were seeing the truth.
translation.zh: 但我们看到的却是事实

translation.en: More than they could see.
Once you open the door, you can never close it.
translation.zh: 那扇门一旦开启，就无法关上

translation.en: Not true. I closed it.
Then I locked it...
...and then I threw away the key.
I really hope that's true.
You know, my train leaves in half an hour.
translation.zh: 我的火车过半小时就要开了

translation.en: Okay. I'll get you on your way.
So good luck with your job, okay?
I wanted to thank you for what you did.
translation.zh: 我要谢谢你为我做的一切

translation.en: You really helped me.
You helped me.
You taught me how to listen.
Thank you.
We made it.
No!
